name: Dark Souls II: Augur of Darkness
summary: Dark Souls II: Augur of Darkness is a comprehensive overhaul mod for Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin. This mod aims to significantly alter the gameplay experience by introducing new enemy placements, rebalancing combat, and modifying item locations. It enhances difficulty by adjusting enemy AI and attack patterns, creating a more challenging environment. The mod also adds new weapons, armour sets, and spells, expanding the game's customisation options. Additionally, Augur of Darkness includes changes to level design and boss encounters
